name: LAB_CASE_QA_CMT
description: This table extracts the comments of a related QA (Quality Assurance) event.

columns.name: REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: LAB_AP_QA_COMMENT
columns.description: Stores the comments of a related QA (Quality Assurance) event.
